00013 #ifndef __INPUT_EVENT_H__
00014 #define __INPUT_EVENT_H__
00015 
00016 #include <vector>
00017 #include "osystem.h"
00018 #include "InputService.h"
00019 
00020 namespace omega
00021 {
00022 
00023 //will be used to store point data for the markers that make up MoCap rigid bodies
00024 struct Point
00025 {
00026         float x;
00027         float y;
00028         float z;
00029 };
00030 
00032 struct InputEvent
00033 {
00034         // Supported event types.
00035         enum Type 
00036         { 
00037                 // Move: Generated whenever the source of an event moves.
00038                 Move, 
00039                 // Down: generated when the source of an event goes to a logical 'down' state (i.e. touch on a surface or 
00040                 // a mouse button press count as Down events)
00041                 Down, 
00042                 // Up: generated when the source of an event goes to a logical 'up' state (i.e. remove touch from a surface or 
00043                 // a mouse button release count as Up events)
00044                 Up, 
00045                 // Trace: generated when a new object is identified by the device managed by the input service 
00046                 // (i.e head tracking, or a mocap system rigid body).
00047                 Trace, 
00048                 // Trace: generated when a traced object is lost by the device managed by the input service 
00049                 // (i.e head tracking, or a mocap system rigid body).
00050                 Untrace
00051         };
00052 
00053         // id of the source of this event. Input services associate unique ids to each of their event sources.
00054     unsigned int sourceId;
00055         
00056         // Type of the service that generated this event.
00057         enum InputService::ServiceType serviceType;
00058 
00059         // Unique id of the service that generated this event.
00060         int serviceId;
00061 
00062         // The event type.
00063     enum Type type;
00064 
00065         // Event flags.
00066         unsigned int flags;
00067 
00068         // Event timestamp.
00069         unsigned int timestamp;
00070 
00071         // Position.
00072     float x;
00073         float y;
00074         float z;
00075 
00076         // Rotation.
00077         float rw;
00078     float rx;
00079         float ry;
00080         float rz;
00081 
00082         //Point set
00083         int numberOfPoints;
00084         Vector3f pointSet[32];
00085 };
00086 
00087 }; // namespace omega
00088 
00089 #endif
